title: RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for 02 Supervisor Posts
description: Regional Institute of Medical Sciences Imphal (RIMS Imphal) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Supervisor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., Diploma in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply bef...
